column1: Thus, there were two rival claims before the learned 1 iistrict Judge of Matale namely a
declaration of title prayed for by the Plaintiff and ejectment of the Defendant on the one
hand  and  a  claim  for  declaration  of  title  based  on  prescription  on  the  part  of
Defendants. When the trid was taken up, several admissions were recorded among which
one finds an unambiguous admission as to title of the plaintiff to the property.
It is trite law that  once the title of the plaintiff is admitted in a re vindicatio  action,

column2: burden shifts to the defendant to show that his possession is  lawful~see  Wanigaratne
